description: This Java source file defines a REST controller (`HelloController`) in a Spring Boot application. It provides several GET endpoints: a welcome message at '/', a redirect to Swagger UI at '/docs', a health check at '/health', and an application info endpoint at '/api/info'. The controller includes Swagger/OpenAPI annotations for API documentation and uses Spring MVC annotations for request mapping and response handling.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints like welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and application info in a Spring Boot backend.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Handles GET requests at '/' and returns a welcome string.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Handles GET requests at '/docs', constructs and redirects to the Swagger UI URL based on the incoming request.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Handles GET requests at '/health' and returns a simple 'OK' string indicating application health.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Handles GET requests at '/api/info' and returns information about the application.
